author: unknown 848261
comment: Great simple barebones notepad app! Im very happy with it's layout and function. Clean interface. No advertisements is always appreciated for small apps like this. The only suggestion I would have is the option to disable syncing with google, I would like to use the app strictly offline and privately without having to share my data with my gmail.

author: Vinod Saroj
comment: nice and easy have to use

author: RiCo
comment: Nice, clean simple app

author: Al Fordy
comment: Seemed like a good App but upon opening it on another device and linking my Google Account, none of my notes were showing. Doesn't appear to be syncing and I can't find an option to manually do so.

reply.author: Kamal Faraj
reply.content: Hello, there might be some delay to retrieve the notes from Google Drive after the installation. Best regards

comment: The app first worked good but now it doesnt get snyc with the phone

author: Sanjith sudhakaran
comment: I can't download this .... it show downloading pending since an hour.

reply.author: Kamal Faraj
reply.content: Hello, if you cannot download the app it is an issue with Google Play, not with the app itself. The size of the APK is really small. Best regards

author: Jatz
comment: Love it thanks just what wanted. Can we have Daily reminder

author: Mad Monk
comment: Excellent app and great for me as cross country driver I save lists of house and depot numbers to go with the day nav addresses. Would give it 5 stars but can't get a drawer on my watch Sony 3 . If I could it would be hands down perfect.

author: JayY1Thousand
comment: No issues now... but I'm still very disappointed about what happened to my essay.

reply.author: Kamal Faraj
reply.content: Hello, do you still have sync issues with the new version? Thanks for your review

author: Ashwini Singh
comment: it's an amazing app. One question: can we find these notes in google drive??

reply.author: Kamal Faraj
reply.content: Hello, the notes are not visible in Google Drive. Thanks for your review

author: Jay Tee
comment: Cool app, also really cool that they used gibberish from Lorem Ipsum from Jack Blank. :P

comment: Okk,  please try to create folder system & it will be helpful..

comment: Dear Developer create an option to add people, also add camera n galarey.

author: אורי יהודה
comment: This notepad is simple and efficient!
title: Cool

author: al ghareeb
comment: Amazing keep it up

author: Syed Aryan
comment: Awesome.

author: Maxence Bobin
comment: Amazing app. However, my notes are not saved on my Google account. Is this normal or did I do something wrong ? :)

reply.author: Kamal Faraj
reply.content: Hello, once you choose your account and grant access to Google Drive, the notes should be synced automatically when the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network. Please note that there might be some delay. Thanks for your review

author: Joseph Yarger
comment: This app is perfect. I keep all my delivery numbers and lists on my watch now and can leave my phone in my truck. Many of my customers allow phones on site and this keeps me from carrying a notepad around. Love it love it love it.

author: Maxwell Ujdak
comment: I love it, but I would love a black background option with white text.

author: Kunal Alnavar
comment: Can't Access Note on Watch

reply.author: Kamal Faraj
reply.content: Hello, do you have any message displayed on the watch when you launch the notepad?

author: Jaime Morales
comment: It use to work perfectly but ever since the android 2.0 push, I have not seen the notes update to my watch. I would have to uninstall then Reinstall the app in order to gain access to Updated notes on my watch. Developer, please look into this.  UPDATE: I'm officially done with this app, I've lost 2 years worth of notes (lucky backed up) over an issue that was never there before. I will be taking my interest elsewhere.

reply.author: Kamal Faraj
reply.content: Hello, can you tell me if you have the same version of the Google Play services installed on both the phone and the watch? Can you also tell me how you lost your notes? If you granted access to Google Drive, they should be safely backed up. I hope that I can help you

author: Ivan Žuntar
comment: Everything's great, only thing i would like to see in future update is option to add picture in note

author: Cindy Camble
comment: simple, uses color. I want to be able to move the colors around in the order of my choosing.

author: Wilang Sundakalangan
comment: It's what I need...

author: Dafalla Motasim
comment: It's just brilliant!!

author: Depressed Bellamy
comment: exelent app!!!!!!! im not giving 5 stars just because when i uninstall the app and install it again i can't have my notes back, even when i sync my email. i think you could do someting to fix this!! great app, congrats

author: Ni'Keria Sloan
comment: best notepad app i've ever seen.  i love how you can change the colors to the notes & how the notes are automatically saved to your Google account so that if you changed devices, you'd still have your same notes.

author: Rollin James
comment: Needs to be compatible with laptop computers Windows so we can have them and update them as we need to where phones aren't available. IE office meetings.

author: Paniz Am
comment: Made in Iran😍👌

author: AfifA Adnan
comment: Take notes quick and easily

author: Balwinder Randhawa
comment: Good app

Awesome app, simple and easy to use with sufficient powerful features to do a great job. A great addition to this app would be to be able to assign custom color, and assign note listing  priority for color selected. My compliments to the developer, and I hope to return the courtesy in the future.
I have tried almost all major notes taking app. This one doesn't have some features but it is stable and fast enough.

author: Ugochukwu Kanu-Chukwuma
comment: It'll be awesome to approve or cancel any changes made on the notepad besides it's a very lovely app. Thanks to developer!

author: kapil dhakad
comment: this app is very useful. and nice
title: very good app

author: barn owl
comment: Keep it simple please
title: Good

author: Ernest Nestman
comment: The auto sync does not work unless you have sync on. Please add swipe down to sync feature to help. Thanks.

reply.author: Kamal Faraj
reply.content: Hello, if the master sync is disabled you can force a sync operation from the accounts settings. Thanks for you review

author: ems
comment: Please add checkboxes and allow main teal/turquoise colour of app to be changed for when using app's widget. Also, more colours could be added to note colours. Thanks!

author: Techy Tejas
comment: Nice and best app I would like to say to take down notes.
